## 题目`r n_task()`：虚拟变量编码

根据案例情形，数据集中存在三个定性变量$(edu_i,dpt_i,sex_i)$，我们需要依次将它们转换为各自的虚拟变量体系：

```{r}
df_dummy <- df_base %>%
  fastDummies::dummy_cols(select_columns = c("edu","dpt","sex"))

mod_poly <- formula(wage~age+I(age^2))

mod_add_only <- formula(wage~edu_pri+edu_mid+edu_hig+dpt_per+sex_m)


mod_cross_full <- formula(wage~I(dpt_per*sex_m)+I(dpt_per*edu_pri)+I(dpt_per*edu_mid)+I(dpt_per*edu_hig)+I(sex_m*edu_pri)+I(sex_m*edu_mid)+I(sex_m*edu_hig))

mod_cross_sex <- formula(wage~edu_pri+edu_mid+edu_hig+dpt_per+sex_m+I(sex_m*edu_pri)+I(sex_m*edu_mid)+I(sex_m*edu_hig))


mod_hybrid <- formula(wage~age+I(age^2)+edu_pri+edu_mid+edu_hig+dpt_per+sex_m+I(sex_m*edu_pri)+I(sex_m*edu_mid)+I(sex_m*edu_hig))

```


\begin{align}
&edu \Longrightarrow  
  \begin{cases}
    edu\_ill  =
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{ill}\\
    0, & \text{not ill}
    \end{cases} \\
    edu\_pri = 
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{pri}\\
    0, & \text{not pri}
    \end{cases} \\
    edu\_mid  =
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{mid}\\
    0, & \text{not mid}
    \end{cases}\\
     edu\_hig  =
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{hig}\\
    0, & \text{not hig}
    \end{cases}
  \end{cases}
\end{align}

\begin{align}
&dpt \Longrightarrow  
  \begin{cases}
    dpt\_tem  =
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{tem}\\
    0, & \text{not tem}
    \end{cases} \\
    dpt\_per = 
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{per}\\
    0, & \text{not per}
    \end{cases} 
  \end{cases}
\end{align}

\begin{align}
&sex \Longrightarrow  
  \begin{cases}
    sex\_f  =
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{f}\\
    0, & \text{not f}
    \end{cases} \\
    sex\_m = 
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{m}\\
    0, & \text{not m}
    \end{cases} 
  \end{cases}
\end{align}
